item.description:
Arrive at 10:00 and launch by 10:30 AM

Organizers: Mark Roberts, mroberts@CIA.com 401-533-1883 cell

Check RICKA Message Board for last minute cancellations Message Board. Also check RICKA for additional paddles scheduled RICKA Schedule and Blackstone Paddlers Schedule.

Easy flat water paddle, upstream and back, about 6 miles total. Bits of quick water and fallen trees along the way. No portages.

Bring a lunch.


DIRECTIONS: From I-95 take RI Exit 1 (right at end of exit), Head south on Route 3 (toward Ashaway) go for about 2 miles. Take a left onto Route 216 and go for 2 miles. Take right onto Route 91 and go about 1/4 mile to Bradford fishing access (on Left).
item.how_to_find_us: Orange/Yellow Riot Voyager kayak, shaved head
item.name: Pawcatuck River, Bradford RI
